Please sign and forward on if you support the following statement.

Thanks to the BVCA, Chorley, South Ribble and Lancashire Councils for the installations of Dog Bins along Central Avenue in Buckshaw Village.

Whilst I think it is appalling that the responsible parties have yet to install suitable street furniture including any type of bin for the 2000+ residents now living on the village, I think this in no way condones the behaviour of the minority of dog owners on the village.

Why choose to live in a beautiful and clean village to then allow your dog to foul the area for your friends & neighbours?

Please can the responsible parties please provide Dog Bins for our lovely village.

Keep Buckshaw Village Clean!
